meaning: quantity, measure, weight, amount, consider, estimate, surmise

onyomiExamples.meaning: quantity, amount, volume, capacity, portion (of food), generosity, magnanimity, tolerance, pramana, (in Indian philosophy) means by which one gains accurate and valid knowledge
judge's sentence, assessment of a case

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to measure, to weigh, to survey, to time (sound, gauge, estimate), to conjecture, to infer, to surmise
